name: Rudolph Saves Christmas !
description:
Story:

Santa has dropped gifts from his sleigh ! Rudolph has to collect as many gifts and candy as possible to save Christmas!

Goal of the game:

You have to collect as many gifts and sweets as possible. You lose if you let too much fall... Oh ! and also avoid touching lightning !

Control:

-Use the arrows to move right and left

-Use up arrow to jump
